segments.text: I observe the two children conspiring near the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There’s a boy climbing precariously on a wobbly two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His aim is clearly the open “COOKIE JAR” above him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He reaches one hand in, grabbing treats, while the other holds a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs look like they could collapse or tip at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can practically see it wobbling from here, it's so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands nearby, hand outstretched, eagerly awaiting her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their audacity, doing this right under the woman's nose, is quite something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This blatant disregard for safety infuriates me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is going to fall and seriously hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to intervene before this mischievous plan turns into an accident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The potential for injury here is alarming.
segments.speaker: PAR
